name: Blaster Faster: Galaxy Beta
description:
First of all, thanks for taking a look to my game :D,

This is part of what in final relase will be called "survival mode" not the full game

It's a beta version, looking for feedback, please report any bug and leave your opinion, i'll try to read all the comments.

-Added a download to the pattern generator, post a screenshot if you make something cool =D
